and ( user_name like CONCAT('%','${searchTxt}','%' ) or name like CONCAT('%','${searchTxt}','%' ) )
and ( ad_org_id = #{adOrgId} )
and user_type != 1 and ad_org_id is not null and ad_org_id != ''
order by org_id,user_id desc
